entries.name: Age
entries: Mimiga have a lifespan of about 300 years, reaching maturity at around the same time as humans and are considered elderly by around 200 years of age. At youth, Mimiga display more beastly features such as whiskers and patches of fur. These features eventually become less prominent as they age.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Mimiga are generally good, and believe in equal fairness towards all forms of life. Though they are generally lawful and value tradition as a society, Mimiga are natural pranksters at heart. Even the most benevolent individual has the occasional tendency for harmless mischief.

entries.name: Size
entries: Mimiga are slightly shorter than humans but have similar proportions; usually standing about 5 to 6 feet tall and weighing around 110 pounds. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You cannot discern colour in darkness, only shades of grey.

entries.name: Animal Whisperer
entries: You can communicate in a limited manner with mammalian beasts of Small and Tiny sizes. They can understand the meaning of your words, though you can only understand them by interpreting their gestures, body language, and movement.

entries.name: Claws
entries: Your claws are a natural weapon, which you can use to make unarmed strikes. If you hit with them, you deal slashing damage equal to 1d4 + your Strength modifier.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write {@language Common} and {@language Sylvan}.

entries.name: Fox's Cunning
entries: You have proficiency in {@skill Insight}.

entries.name: Crafty Magic
entries: You know the {@spell minor illusion} cantrip. You can also cast {@spell disguise self} once, and it recharges after a long rest. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Cat's Talent
entries: You have proficiency in {@skill Acrobatics}.

entries.name: Nine Lives
entries: When you are reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, you can drop to 1 hit point instead. You can't use this feature again until you finish a long rest.

entries.name: Raccoon's Trickery
entries: You have proficiency in {@skill Persuasion}.

entries.name: Witty Escape
entries: You can take the {@action Disengage} or {@action Hide} action as a bonus action. You can't use this feature again until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Rabbit's Instincts
entries: You have proficiency in {@skill Perception}.

entries.name: Lucky Feet
entries: You have strong feet which carry you quickly across the ground. When you move on your turn in combat, you can double your speed until the end of the turn. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you move 0 feet on one of your turns.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: The Kawauso Mimiga are generally good and tend towards law and neutrality, as they usually live in well-ordered communities.

entries.name: Hold Breath
entries: You can hold your breath for up to 15 minutes at a time.

entries.name: Otter's Vigor
entries: You have a swimming speed equal to your walking speed.

entries.name: Tool Mastery
entries: You gain two {@book tool|phb|5|tools} proficiencies of your choice. In addition, choose one tool you are proficient with. It does not have to be from the ones granted by this trait. You double your proficiency bonus for any ability checks you make with it.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: The Yagi Mimiga are generally good and tend towards neutrality. They see themselves less of nature's caretakers and prefer to go with the flow of nature, rather actively try to alter its course.

entries.name: Horns
entries: You can use your head and horns to make unarmed strikes. If you hit with them, you deal bludgeoning damage equal to 1d4 + your Strength modifier.

entries.name: Goat's Tenacity
entries: You have a climbing speed equal to your walking speed.

entries.name: Battering Ram
entries: If you move at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hit it with a melee weapon attack on the same turn, you can immediately follow that attack with a bonus action, making one unarmed strike against the target with your horns. On a hit, the target must make a a Strength saving throw. On a failure, you can push them 5 feet away from you to an unoccupied space or knock them {@condition prone}, provided the target is no more than one size larger than you. The DC is equal to 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Strength modifier.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: The Koumori Mimiga tend towards neutrality. They see the world as a place of predators and prey, where life and death are natural processes. They wish only to survive, and prefer to leave other creatures to their own devices.

entries.name: Fangs
entries: Your fangs are a natural weapon, which you can use to make unarmed strikes. If you hit with it, you deal piercing damage equal to 1d4 + your Strength modifier.

entries.name: Bat's Wings
entries: You have a flying speed of 30 feet while you aren't wearing heavy armor.

entries.name: Blindsight
entries: You can perceive your surroundings without relying on sight. While you aren't {@condition deafened}, you have {@sense blindsight} with a range of 20 feet.

entries.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: You have disadvantage on attack rolls and Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight when you, the target of the attack, or whatever you are trying to perceive is in direct sunlight.

entries.name: Echolocation
entries: As a bonus action you can emit a series of high frequency sound pulses to determine the location of solid objects and creatures within 30 feet of you. The sound pulses do not go around corners. You have advantage on attack rolls on targets detected by this ability that you can also see. You can't use this feature while deafened.
